content:
# The smelting process has timed out again, indicating that the furnace has not produced enough iron plates to meet the threshold of 30. 
# However, the furnace is currently holding 24 iron plates, which means it was actively processing but did not complete in the expected time frame.
# 
# I will check the furnace's inventory and status to understand how many iron plates it has produced during this time and whether it is still operational.

# Checking the furnace inventory and status once more.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Checking the furnace's inventory.
print(f"Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Displaying the furnace's inventory.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Displaying the entities on the map related to the furnace.
